name: Ricetta: pesce corno alla griglia
desc: A detailed step-by-step recipe for making Grilled Tiger Fish.

value.name: Pesce
value.desc: Un filetto di pesce fresco. Se trattato in modo appropriato, può diventare un piatto prelibato.

value.name: Pepe
value.desc: Peppery. Cuts through oily flavors and excites the taste buds. Goes best on meat.

value.name: Pesce corno alla griglia
value.desc: A fish kebab grilled over an open flame. The fish is a fresh catch straight from the harbor, lightly seasoned and swiftly grilled. Its aroma attracts the street cats. Indeed, freshness is the secret of flavor.

value.name: Keqing
value.desc: La Yuheng delle Sette Stelle di Liyue, Keqing avrebbe molto da dire sull'approccio unilaterale di Rex Lapis ai processi decisionali di Liyue. In realtà, gli dèi ammirano parecchio gli scettici come lei.

value.name: Pesce alla griglia del sopravvissuto
value.desc: Keqing's specialty. This dish was not grilled. Instead, it was fried from within through the delicate application of Electro. A gentle bite reveals fragrant fish under the lightly charred skin, its taste perfectly balanced. So, is this how she survives in the wild? You really can't judge a book by its cover.

value.text: <color=#ffffffd9>Purchase from Chef Mao at Wanmin Restaurant</color>
